title: Really high ping recently
body: The past few days I've been getting some pretty insane ping spikes any time I get into game and it's becoming unplayable. Is this a known issue, are there any known fixes, and is there an approximate fix time  because I know that other people are also having some ping issues. My ISP is Telstra and i'm almost certain that it isn't my ISP.

replies.body: I keep getting "Attempt to Reconnect" in game, some times its fine, other times i cant play at ALL as its constant through out the game.

Same here, I used to get 60 ms, but its gradually increased each day since Saturday, and I just checked in a custom and I had 200 ms. I am the only person using this internet connection and made sure I had nothing running besides LoL each time I played. I use TrustPower as an ISP and would love to hear a response from Riot
i get around 47-51 and even in a a custom game i am getting over 1000. i hate not being able to not play league

Phew, i thought i was the only one, i had my ping rise to over 200 and nearly blamed the boy on it. I was as 45 ms, its gone back to normal now, but was the same time frame you have said around about. I wonder if their servers were overloaded at the time..
